item.title: Spartans Security Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: Spartans Security Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsAugust 19, 2025Spartans Securityis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for vulnerabilities in software, services, and infrastructure owned and managed by Spartans Security, and vulnerabilities researched and found by Spartans Security in third-party products that are not part of another CNA's scope.

item.title: Software.com Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: Software.com Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsAugust 19, 2025Software.comis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for Software.com issues only.

item.title: All Links from Legacy “cve.mitre.org” Website Now Redirect to CVE.ORG
item.description: All Links from Legacy “cve.mitre.org” Website Now Redirect to CVE.ORGnewsAugust 26, 2025The legacy “cve.mitre.org” was retired on August 26, 2025. All legacy links from the legacy cve.mitre.org website, including those for individual CVE Records, are now redirected toCVE.ORG.

item.title: GeoVision Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: GeoVision Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsAugust 26, 2025GeoVision Inc.is now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for vulnerabilities in GeoVision products only.

item.title: Commvault Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: Commvault Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsAugust 26, 2025Commvault Systems Inc.is now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for vulnerabilities in Commvault SaaS and software products only.

item.title: AxxonSoft Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: AxxonSoft Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsAugust 26, 2025AxxonSoft Limitedis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for AxxonSoft products and solutions only.

item.title: Searching for Patterns Now Available in “CVE List Keyword Search” on CVE.ORG Website
item.description: Searching for Patterns Now Available in “CVE List Keyword Search” on CVE.ORG WebsitenewsAugust 27, 2025“CVE List Keyword Search” on the CVE.ORG has been updated based upon feedback back from users. As a reminder, this search is for the CVE List only. It will only searchCVE Records. To search the overall website, use the “Site Search” located to the right of the CVE List search box above.

item.title: CVE Program Report for Quarter 2 Calendar Year (Q2 CY) 2025
item.description: CVE Program Report for Quarter 2 Calendar Year (Q2 CY) 2025blogBy CVE Program|September 3, 2025The CVE Program’s quarterly summary of program milestones and metrics for Q2 CY 2025.

item.title: Vulnerability Data Enrichment for CVE Records: 243 CNAs on the Enrichment Recognition List for September 2, 2025
item.description: Vulnerability Data Enrichment for CVE Records: 243 CNAs on the Enrichment Recognition List for September 2, 2025blogBy CVE Program|September 3, 2025

item.title: HackRTU Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: HackRTU Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsSeptember 9, 2025HackRTUis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for vulnerability assignment related to its vulnerability coordination role for Industrial Control Systems (ICS) that are not covered by another CNA’s scope.
